Articles.Content:
A passing spacecraft suffers a warp core breach nearby, destroying your cartoony hill. Then I build a new hill from the scraps of the vessel.

My scrappy hill.

procedes to make a small hill

my hill pls dont touch

The hill is untouched and detached.

A free-floating hill.

I kick the hill, since it has no friction with the ground.

Your sky-high hill.

I cause the hill to notice that it is not connected to the ground, it falls and disintegrates into a pile of dirt, which I form into a hill, and cover with crates and sticks of dynamite, allowing me to destroy it, and you, at will, from my underground bunker, accessible only from a bulletproof rabbit hole (I too have no idea how that works, or why anyone would want or need one. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")) 

My explosive hill.

Hill explodes.

Exploded hill.

I get a large amount of gunpowder from a gun store nearby (I have no idea why one be there there), and I shape it into a hill. I get onto the hill and ready a match to blow the hill sky high as soon as someone approaches

My combustible gunpowder hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-08-17T14:47:17Z" title="08/17/2021 02:47  PM" data-short="2 yr">August 17, 2021</time> by DunaManiac**

I shoot a flamethrower at it, it explodes, I build a new hill out of "just add water boulders", I got a box of a thousand of them at the local mine, uranium mine that is.

My radioactive hill

I drop a [EXPLETETIVE REDACTED] (SCP reference) ton of anti-radioactive shampoo on the hill

My hill

I scoop several tons of salt water from the ocean, and completely douse the hill with water, washing off the anti-radioactive shampoo on the hill, and restoring it to it's radioactive state. Donning an Environmental Suit, I claim the hill as an exclusion zone is created and an evacuation of everything within several miles is declared, and no-one can get in without getting legally prosecuted in court.

My irradiated hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-08-17T17:11:38Z" title="08/17/2021 05:11  PM" data-short="2 yr">August 17, 2021</time> by DunaManiac**

I drop a giant anvil on it from orbit.

My squished hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-08-17T17:03:07Z" title="08/17/2021 05:03  PM" data-short="2 yr">August 17, 2021</time> by Hyperspace Industries**

I climb on top of the anvil, and pour some dirt on it.

My hill, on top of anvil, on top of hill.

For just this occasion, I fitted a self destruct mechanism to the anvil, I self-destruct it, and go to a nearby forest, get several tons of wood, pile it in the crater from the anvil, and burn it.

My cremated hill.

I fall asleep near it, if anyone makes noise, I'll fight back.![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ":wink:")

Good night. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

It's the Moon. No air, no noise.

A sleepy vacuum hill.
I attach 1000000000000000000000 huge srbs to the moon and deorbit it. Where the crater is on Earth, i build by hill.

Spoiler

![5jyu5l.jpg](https://i.imgflip.com/5jyu5l.jpg)

But i hijack the hill with Jack.

My hill.
It's a Jackhill and Hide hill.

I lift the Jackhill with a large carjack and make a hill beneath it.

Carjack Jackhill hill.

I build a giant hiluxium (the indestructible super material old Toyota  hiluxes are made of (see: top gear)) brick wall over the hill to stop this joke from continuing, and make five more walls in a cube around a hiluxium hill.

My totally indestructible hill

I go to the console commands and cheat the hill to be destructible gain and then i conquer it with a 1000 not-see german panzers.

My former battleground hill.

~~A~~ Die Panzerin appears on the horizon, and all German Panzers (Tiger, Panther, etc) run there from the battleground.

A post-tank hill.

I obliterate the hill with an orbital bombardment station, then assemble a new hill out of the pulverized dust remaining.

My pulverized post-orbital bombardment-post-tank-hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-08-18T18:34:05Z" title="08/18/2021 06:34  PM" data-short="2 yr">August 18, 2021</time> by DunaManiac**

It laughs.

Hillarious Hill.

All hills are mine as long as they are still on the Earth, and therefore my profile picture.

My mighty hill.![:happy:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/happy.png ":happy:")

(OK, take it)
